title: Surviving the Great Plague
itunes:title: Surviving the Great Plague
itunes:subtitle: Vanessa Harding describes the events of the 1665 Great Plague and explains how people at the time sought to cope with the disease. Historyextra.com/podcas
description:
As we grapple with the Covid-19 pandemic, historian Vanessa Harding describes the events of the Great Plague that afflicted London in 1665, and explains how people at the time sought to cope with the disease. Historyextra.com/podcast

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
